For those with stress level being low (B=0), the probability of market demand being high (C=1) is 0.6733. 
For those with stress level being high (B=1), the probability of market demand being high (C=1) is 0.7025. 
For those with traffic congestion being low (A=0) and market demand being low (C=0), the probability of appearance being high (D=1) is 0.7866. 
For those with traffic congestion being low (A=0) and market demand being high (C=1), the probability of appearance being high (D=1) is 0.5072. 
For those with traffic congestion being high (A=1) and market demand being low (C=0), the probability of appearance being high (D=1) is 0.6281. 
For those with traffic congestion being high (A=1) and market demand being high (C=1), the probability of appearance being high (D=1) is 0.3205.
